name: Puyo Puyo!! 20th Anniversary
description:
Puyo Puyo!! 20th Anniversary is a game developed by Sonic Team. It was originally released in 2011. SEGA published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Puyo Puyo!! 20th Anniversary on PSP, Nintendo DS, Wii and Nintendo 3DS.
It was produced by Mizuki Hosoyamada. It was directed by Takumi Yoshinaga. Hideki Abe scored the game.
